column1: 13893596$Exodius the Ultimate Forbidden Lord$$DARK$[Spellcaster/effect]$$$$$10$0$0$$$$Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by shuffling all monsters in your Graveyard into the Deck
